item.title: Hello World
item.description: Greeting, here is how I set up my working environment on Fedora Install NVIDIA Driver on Fedora update kernel reboot and switch to updated kernel install packages from rpmfusion reboot here is some useful command for check the installation process monitoring if akmod is running in the background, it usually takes 5-10 minutes watch 'ps ax|grep kmod' force akmod to run sudo akmods --force sudo dracut --force check if nvidia is successfully installed
